result.eng: What is written at the top of the page? What does it say at the top of the page?
result.ga: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leathanaigh
result.orig: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leathanaigh
result.html: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leathanaighWhat is written at the top of the page? What does it say at the top of the page?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá scríofa ag barr an leaṫanaiġWhat is written at the top of the page? What does it say at the top of the page?

result.eng: The page number can be found at the bottom of the page.
result.ga: Ag bun an leathanaigh a gheobhaidh tú uimhir an leathanaigh
result.orig: Ag bun an leathanaigh a gheobhaidh tú uimhir an leathanaigh
result.html: Ag bun an leathanaigh a gheobhaidh tú uimhir an leathanaighThe page number can be found at the bottom of the page.
result.ponchtml: Ag bun an leaṫanaiġ a ġeoḃaiḋ tú uiṁir an leaṫanaiġThe page number can be found at the bottom of the page.

result.eng: It is at the bottom of the page.
result.ga: Tá sé ag bun an leathanaigh
result.orig: Tá sé ag bun an leathanaigh
result.html: Tá sé ag bun an leathanaighIt is at the bottom of the page.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag bun an leaṫanaiġIt is at the bottom of the page.

result.eng: I makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.
result.ga: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sin
result.orig: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sin
result.html: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sinI makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.
result.ponchtml: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leaṫanaiġ má ḃíonn sé beagáinín níos daṫúla ná sinI makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.
